Class ContainSoftclipCounter

    public class ContainSoftclipCounter
extends java.lang.Object
implements SingleReadStatFunction<java.lang.Integer>
    Counts the number of reads containing soft-clips (cigar 'S').

      • reduce

        public java.lang.Integer reduce(java.lang.Integer current,
                                java.lang.Integer accumulator)
        Description copied from interface: StatFunction
        Combines a statistic generated from one pair and a running accumulator.

        Example of implementations can be median, mean or counts.

        Specified by:
